title: Microsoft Edge 99 brings custom passwords for autofill and improved PDF navigation
content:
Microsoft has released another new version of its Edge browser, this time bringing it to version 99. As it’s the last major release before version 100, Microsoft is once again warning web developers that the user agent string is going to change and that it could potentially break some websites. This is something that’s also

The post Microsoft Edge 99 brings custom passwords for autofill and improved PDF navigation appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has released Edge version 99, bringing with it the ability to set a custom password to protect your saved passwords.
